price: Enti (Nkͻmhyεni), entie (Kaafirfoͻ) boniayεfoͻ no, na fa (Qur’aan no) kotia wͻn nko dene mu paa.
arabic: فَلَا تُطِعِ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ وَجَٰهِدۡهُم بِهِۦ جِهَادٗا كَبِيرٗا

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: falā tuṭiʿi al-kāfirīna wajāhid'hum bihi jihādan kabīran
